name: Date - MMDDYY - no leap yr check
description: STEP 1: (a) Checks for (MMDD) for 31days months (b) Checks for (MMDD) for 30 days (c) Checks for (MMDD) for 29 days (no leap yr check) :: STEP 2: (YY) \d{2} = any 2 digit number can be year. Mail me at aviralmsharma@gmail.com if you find error(s)
